name: Deep Dungeon: Gym
description:
Deep Dungeon: Gym is a procedurally generated parody action rpg with naked men.
Your grandfather left you an old, abandoned gym. Can you become new Dungeon Master? Prove your strength, destroy hordes of evil and naked men in enemy gyms.

Features:
  • Tonns of naked men.
  • Procedural generation.
  • The ability to collect panties and drink protein.
  • Difficulty that can remove your saves
  • Different classes and strange abilities.
  • Ability to pump your hero. (The game about the gym)
  • And much much much more.

All matches with real sports halls and people are random. Naked men are not random.
